featured.text: However, a man known as Mestre Bimba devoted a great deal of time and effort to convincing the Brazilian authorities that Capoeira has great cultural value and should become an official fighting style.
It was officially recognized in Brazil through the effort of Mestre Bimba.

definition.zh_def: 一種用於形容年輕女孩或女性的俚語，通常帶有可愛或天真的意味。
definition.en_def: A slang term used to describe a young girl or woman, often implying cuteness or innocence.
definition.example: The little bimba danced happily at the party.
